column4: hi all, i am currently hoping to upgrade my compaq pc as the motherboard, graphics card and power psu are pretty useless, i was looking at some of these AMD bundle kits that have the following components --->  AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ 3.0GHz Socket AM2 2MB, BOXED w/fan and an Asus M2A-VM HDMI, AMD 690G+SB600, HDMI,Socket-AM2,m-ATX,DDR2,Firewire,PCI-Ex16 motherboard. Does anybody know if there are any known compatibility issues with th
does ubuntu not support the 64 bit or is it just easier with drivers etc and wine to use 32 bit?
Ubuntu supports 64-bit, but 32-bit is a lot easier to use for newbies
